verses.verse: My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3700>longs<s%>, <S%H3615>Yes<s%>, even faints for the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: my <S%H3820>heart<s%> and my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> cries <S%H7442>out<s%> for the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>.

<S%H6833>Yes<s%>, the sparrow has <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%>, and the <S%H1866>swallow<s%> a <S%H7064>nest<s%> for <S%H7896>herself<s%>, where she may lay her <S%H667>young<s%>, even your <S%H4196>altars<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, my <S%H4428>King<s%>, and my <S%H430>God<s%>.
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> are they that <S%H3427>live<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%>: they will be still <S%H1984>praising<s%> <S%H5542>you<s%>. Selah.
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> whose <S%H5797>strength<s%> is in <S%H3824>you<s%>; in whose heart are the ways of <S%H4546>them<s%>.
Who <S%H5674>passing<s%> through the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H1056>Baca<s%> <S%H7896>make<s%> it a <S%H4599>well<s%>; the <S%H4175>rain<s%> also <S%H5844>fills<s%> the <S%H1293>pools<s%>.
They <S%H3212>go<s%> from <S%H2428>strength<s%> to <S%H2428>strength<s%>, every one of them in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> before <S%H430>God<s%>.
O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>: give <S%H238>ear<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
<S%H7200>Behold<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%> our <S%H4043>shield<s%>, and <S%H5027>look<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of your <S%H4899>anointed<s%>.

For a <S%H3117>day<s%> in your <S%H2691>courts<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than a <S%H505>thousand<s%>. I had <S%H977>rather<s%> be a <S%H5605>doorkeeper<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H430>God<s%>, than to <S%H1752>live<s%> in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H8121>sun<s%> and <S%H4043>shield<s%>: the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> and <S%H3519>glory<s%>: no <S%H2896>good<s%> thing will he <S%H4513>withhold<s%> from them that <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H8549>uprightly<s%>.
O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, <S%H835>blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> that trusts in <S%H982>you<s%>.
